article_title: 'Together we thwarted Iran's attack' - IDF spokesman.
sentence: He  ended  by  saying  that  Israel  had  not  lost  sight  of  what  he  called  the  country's  mission  in  Gaza  -  where  Israel  has  been  attempting  to  destroy  the  Palestinian  armed  group  Hamas  and  free  hostages  taken  by  the  group  when  it  attacked  Israeli  communities  last  October,  killing  about  1,200  mainly  civilians.
